titleSection.name: VersionOne Integration for Bugzilla
titleSection.shortDescription: Creates defects in VersionOne based on bugs in Bugzilla.

descriptionSection.description: VersionOne Integration for Bugzilla creates defects in VersionOne based on bugs in Bugzilla. Using this integration your organization can manage and triage bugs reported by customers and promote them to VersionOne once you determine a fix is necessary.

linksSection.title: GitHub Project for Source Code and Issues

updates.releaseNotes: * Updated to work properly when using Windows Integrated Auth in VersionOne
* Updated to use the new Bugzilla REST Endpoint
* Fixed: Error in V1.pm file resulting in function not found message
* Fixed: Config tool exception when switching to Bugzilla configurations
* Fixed: Support new and previous bug workflows

* Added: Support for Bugzilla 4.4 (up to 4.4.2) 
 * Updated: Compiled with .NET Framework 4.5.1

* Fixed reopen scenario so reopening issues creates new VersionOne workitems with link to previous item 
 * Fixed line-endings for Perl scripts for Linux 
 * Fixed problem with selecting custom VersionOne field for reference

* Added: Support for connecting to VersionOne through a proxy. 
 * Added: Support for Bugzilla 4.0 
 * Added: Configuration Utility contains help on the various configuration options to enable quicker setup and configuration. 
 * Added: Configuration Utility supports a minimum poll interval of one minute for testing. It is not recommended that poll intervals remain this low in a production instance. Update: Source code project was dependent on .NET 3.5. Now source code project depends on the latest .NET SDK. 
 * Updated: Integration depends on Log4Net 
 * Updated: Poll time interval defaults to 30 minutes 
 * Fixed: Configuration Utility allows editing of the VersionOne credential fields when Windows Integrated Authentication is enabled. This enables configuring the integrations to connect to VersionOne as a user other than the local service account when the VersionOne instance is configured for Windows integrated authentication.
Added support for mapping projects and priority values
Fixed: Exception when validating the Bugzilla URL in Config tool

* Added GUI Tool for configuration 
 * Updated Documentation

* Added support for Bugzilla 3.2.3 
 * Fixed query issue when integration and VersionOne are in different timezones 
 * Removed dependency on the older APIClient library.  Integration now depends on APIClient library from SDK

seed.shortDescription: The initial idea of a product. May not be stable code.

sapling.shortDescription: The product is undergoing rapid growth. The code works but expect major changes.

mature.shortDescription: The product is stable. The code will continue to evolve with minimum breaking changes.

mediaSection.title: Bugzilla Integration
mediaSection.caption: Triage defects and include them in the planning process to balance new work and maintenance
